comments.body: Ah I left this in accidentally. I actually think printing the uv handle section of the report is quite useful for debugging failures in this test, so I'm inclined to leave it in unless there are objections.

I don't mind keeping this. It might not be necessary though. If you use any of the report validation functions in `test/common/report.js`, the [full report is printed on failure](https://github.com/nodejs/node/blob/master/test/common/report.js#L34). That said, if you want to leave this, I'm OK with it.
In https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/25852 the test was failing before the call to `helper.validateContent()`.
